definitions.definition: A spherical , gram-positive bacterium of the genus Streptococcus . Although commonly found benignly in the human mouth and gut, and though many species are non- pathogenic , other species can cause diseases including strep throat and more serious conditions.

main_definition: A spherical , gram-positive bacterium of the genus Streptococcus . Although commonly found benignly in the human mouth and gut, and though many species are non- pathogenic , other species can cause diseases including strep throat and more serious conditions.
